summary: Tunifus brings players across new locations, equipment, and enemies in a lore friendly environment.
descriptionHtml:
Project: Tunifus
Author: Rang3r
Version: 0.1 Test
Release Date: 6/30/2014
Category: Quests
Website(s):

Skyrim Nexus - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/
Steam Workshop - http://steamcommunity.com/workshop/

==================
Requirements:
==================

Skyrim 1.8.151.0

==================
Description:
==================

Tunifus is an upcoming quest mod for Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim that takes players to new locations, equipment, and enemies in a lore friendly environment. Work for an Imperial from Cyrodiil claiming above average Septim for any adventurer brave enough to try his worthy contracts.


==================
Details:
==================

0.1 Test includes

+Quest activation test

+Script test


==================
Installation:
==================

------------------------------
Manual Instructions
------------------------------

1) Extract the contents of the ZIP folder into your Data folder
2) Make sure the Tunifus.esp is checked in the Launcher




==================
Un-Installation:
==================

------------------------------
Manual Instructions
------------------------------

1) Delete the files/folders associated with the mod
2) Unheck the Tunifus.esp in the Launcher




==================
Changelog:
==================

6/30/2014 - Initial Release

==================
Tools Used:
==================

Creation Kit

==================
Licensing/Legal:
==================

You must contact me and obtain my permission before re-packaging any part of this mod.

If I do not respond within 2 weeks, feel free to do whatever you like with this mod.
author: Rang3r
